guidance.title: Guidance text (optional)
guidance.hint: Use Markdown to format the content or add hyperlinks

page_settings.heading: Page heading
page_settings.question_set_name: Give this set of questions a name

page_type.back: Back to add and edit pages
page_type.title: What type of page do you want to add?
page_type.question_page_hint: A page to hold one or more related questions
page_type.guidance_page_hint: If you need to add guidance without asking a question

information_type.back: Back to add and edit pages
information_type.title: What information do you need from users?
information_type.hint: You can ask for more information later

written.title: Written answer
written.hint: A short or long answer as text or number

types.title: Type of written answer
types.long: Long answer (more than a single line)

date.title: Date
date.hint: A day, month and year or month and year only

address.title: UK address
address.hint: A street address, town or city and postcode

phone.title: Phone number
phone.hint: A UK phone number, for example, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192

file.title: Supporting evidence
file.hint: A document, for example, DOC, PDF, CSV, Excel
file.select_title: Select the file types you accept

documents.title: Document types
documents.hint: Select the document types you accept

images.title: Image types
images.hint: Select the image types you accept

tabular.title: Tabular data types
tabular.hint: Select the tabular data types you accept

email.title: Email address
email.hint: An email address, for example, name@example.com

list.title: A list of options that users can choose from

yes_no.title: Yes or No
yes_no.hint: Allow users to answer either 'Yes' or 'No'

checkboxes.title: Checkboxes
checkboxes.hint: A list for users to select multiple answers
checkboxes.hint_text: Use single short sentence without a full stop

hint.label: Hint text (optional)
hint.hint: Use single short sentence without a full stop

value.label: Unique identifier (optional)
value.hint: Used in databases to identify the item

radios.title: Radios
radios.hint: A list for users to select one answer
radios.hint_text: Use single short sentence without a full stop

hint.label: Hint text (optional)
hint.hint: Use single short sentence without a full stop

value.label: Unique identifier (optional)
value.hint: Used in databases to identify the item

select.title: Autocomplete
select.hint: A list of options revealed to users as they type

autocomplete.title: Autocomplete
autocomplete.hint: A list of options revealed to users as they type

options.title: Create and edit your list of autocomplete options
options.hint: Add each option on a new line
options.value_hint: To optionally set an input value for each item, separate the option text and value with a colon (e.g English:en-gb)

error.label: Short description
error.hint: Enter a short description for this question like 'fave animal'. Short descriptions are used in error messages and on the check your answers page.

delete.title: Delete this page
delete.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this page?

short_description.title: Short description
short_description.hint: Enter a short description for this question like 'fave animal'. Short descriptions are used in error messages and on the check your answers page.

min_length.title: Minimum character length (optional)
min_length.hint: The minimum number of characters users can enter

max_length.title: Maximum character length (optional)
max_length.hint: The maximum number of characters users can enter

classes.title: Classes (optional)
classes.hint: Apply CSS classes to this field. For example, 'govuk-input govuk-!-width-full'

regex.title: Regex (optional)
regex.hint: Specifies a regular expression to validate users' inputs. Use JavaScript syntax

max_words.title: Max words (optional)
max_words.hint: Specifies the maximum number of words users can enter

rows.title: Rows (optional)
rows.hint: Specifies the number of textarea rows (default is 5 rows)

form_name.title: Enter name of your form please
form_name.hint: Use an appropriate name for your form. You cannot change the form name once your form is live

error.title: There is a problem
error.exists: The name your entered already exists
error.message: This name already exists. Enter a different name

organisation.title: Choose a lead organisation for this form

team_name.label: Name of team
team_name.hint: Enter the name of the policy team or business area responsible for this form

error.too_long: Name of team must be 100 characters or less

email.label: Shared team email address
email.hint: You can only create forms using a shared team email address. Don't enter your personal email address.

error.missing: Enter a shared team email address
error.invalid_format: Enter a shared team email address in the correct format

support.title: Contact details for support
support.description: You must provide at least one way for users to get help.
support.footer_note: The contact details are shown in the footer of every page of the form.

link.label: Online contact link
link.add: Enter online contact link for support

next_steps.title: What happens next
next_steps.label: Tell users what happens after they submit their form

new_form.label: New form created
new_form.text: Created this forms as requested by Policy Team.
